typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		emp_id as string,
		emp_name as string,
		emp_surname as string,
		emp_designation_id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['*.csv']) ~> source1
source1 filter(emp_id=='1') ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(column1 = concat(emp_name,emp_surname)) ~> NameConcate
NameConcate sink(input(
		emp_id as string,
		emp_name as string,
		emp_surname as string,
		emp_designation_id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['\output\Outputfile.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
